Usage¶

Installation¶

To use appFOM, first install it using pip:

(.venv) $ pip install git+https://github.com/Salander619/appFOM.git

Utilisation¶

This package have been developped in order to be used by the application FOM (https://appapp-oh2r8mbnt58dfttv2vnchz.streamlit.app/). However, it is possible to test the module LISA_noise_configuration and LISA_GB_configuration by running them with python.

FOM application
